auth.registerMessage: Please register to create an account and start the tracking

name_last.max: Last name can't be longer than {length} characters

email.min: This field has to be filled.
email.length: This field must be at least {length} characters at length.
email.existingUser: User with this email already exists

password.min: Password must be at least {length} characters in length
password.max: Password can't be longer than {length} characters
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
password.numeric: Password must contain at least one numeric digit.
password.specialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character.

confirmPassword.min: Password must be at least {length} characters in length
confirmPassword.max: Password can't be longer than {length} characters
confirmPassword.equality: Confirm password and password are not equal

sys.min: Systolic pressure must be at least {length}

dia.min: Diastolic pressure must be at least {length}

notes.min: Notes must be at least {length} characters long
